formalpara.title: Figure 10. NRs control fat metabolism.
formalpara.para: NHR-25 promotes fat synthesis while NHR-64 represses it. NHR-49 interacts with NHR-80, NHR-13, and NHR-66 to promote fatty acid desaturation, beta-oxidation, and inhibit lipid remodeling and sphingolipid metabolism. MDT-15 is a co-activator of NHR-49 that likely interacts with NHR-49 for at least the positive transcriptional functions. NHR-76 promotes lipolysis in response to serotonin signaling. NHR-8 promotes FA desaturation and regulates cholesterol and DA flux.
